resources.string: CEIT Major Selection Tool
CEIT Major Selection Tool
Back

Welcome to the CEIT Major Selection Tool. This app was designed to help offer a major suggestion to incoming CEIT students interested in Computer Science, Information Technology, Software Engineering and Information Systems.
Ready for a career in CEIT but not sure where to start? Tap on the discover button to take a short quiz.
Read up on the available CEIT majors as well as potential careers by tapping below.
Computer Science
Computer Engineering
Information Technology
Information Systems
http://ceit.georgiasouthern.edu/cs/
http://ceit.georgiasouthern.edu/
http://ceit.georgiasouthern.edu/it/
http://coba.georgiasouthern.edu/is/

Computer Science:
Ranges from theoretical foundations to cutting-edge developments
Develop effective ways to solve computing problems
Devise new ways to use computers/nDesigning and implementing software

Design and construction of computers, and computer based systems.
Design of digital hardware/software systems
Development of devices that have embedded systems
Integration of hardware and software

Combination of knowledge and practical applications with hands-on expertise
Maintain an organization’s information technology structure
Installation and maintenance of computer systems
Current emphasis on networks

Satisfy informational needs of businesses and organizations
Emphasis on information rather than technology
Concerned with information provided by computer systems
Determines requirements and design of an organization’s information systems

Computer Programmer

Georgia Southern University, Abraham Baldwin Agricultural College, Albany State University, American Intercontinental University, Armstrong Atlantic State University, Augusta State University, Brewton-Parker College, Clark Atlanta University, Clayton State University, College of Coastal Georgia, Columbus State University, Covenant College, Darton College, Fort Valley State University, Georgia College and State University, Georgia Gwinnett College, Georgia Institute of Technology, Georgia Military College, Georgia Southwestern State University, Georgia State University, Herzing University, Interactive College of Technology, Kennesaw State, LaGrange College, Life University, Lincoln College of Technology, Macon State College, Mercer University, Morehouse College, North Georgia College and State University, omnitech Institute, Savannah State University, Shorter University, South Georgia College, South University, Southern Polytechnic State University, Spelman College, University of Phoenix, University of West Georgia, Valdosta State University, WEsleyan College, Westwood College,

Georgia Southern University, Georgia Institute of Technology, Georgia State university, Morehouse College, mercer University, Valdosta State University, University of West Georgia, Columbus State University, Clayton State University, Clark Atlanta University

This application was designed by students for Dr. Andrew Allen’s Software Engineering course at Georgia Southern University. The purpose of the CEIT Major Selection tool is to help incoming students find information on several majors within the ever-growing field of technology.

Discovery - Answer questions to find out which major best suits your skills and interests.\nExplore - Find information about each of the majors including a description, possible career paths, and a list of colleges that offer the program.
